name: Tool Packer
description:
You work inside a lonely warehouse for a tools company and have to fill every package that arrives at your conveyor belt. 

Are you able to keep up with the growing order size and item diversity?

Controls

- 'W,A,S,D' to move

- 'Mouse' look around

- 'Left Mouse Button' pick up item / put item in package

- 'Right Mouse Button' drop item (if you have an item in your hand)

- 'E' start game

- 'Escape' pause game / resume game

Gameplay

You start with 4 random selected items and their boxes. After you pressed 'E' the conveyor belt will move every 10 seconds. Behind the packages are screens that display the requested items. Pick up one of the requested items out of the boxes located around you and put it in the right package. Repeat this till the package contains all requested items. Each time you fulfill an objective you unlock a new item and the difficulty rises (more items per package).
